name: ynab
description: YNAB (You Need A Budget) is a budgeting tool helping users track expenses, plan finances, and gain control over spending to reduce debt

tools.name: YNAB_CREATE_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Tool to create a new account in a budget. Use when you need to add a manual (non-linked) account to a specific budget.

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: Initial balance of the account in milliunits (1,000 milliunits = 1 unit of currency)

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: ID of the budget in which to create the account

tools.name: YNAB_CREATE_SCHEDULED_TRANSACTION
tools.description: Tool to create a scheduled transaction. Use when you need to set up a repeating transaction in a budget.

inputSchema.title: CreateScheduledTransactionRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget UUID or literal 'last-used'/'default' to operate on

memo.title: Memo
memo.description: Optional note for the scheduled transaction

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount in milliunits (1,000 = 1 unit of currency)

payee_id.title: Payee Id
payee_id.description: UUID of an existing payee (optional; use payee_name if not provided)

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: Repeat frequency using YNAB standard schedule values

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: UUID of the account where the scheduled transaction will post

date_first.title: Date First
date_first.description: First scheduled date in YYYY-MM-DD format

payee_name.title: Payee Name
payee_name.description: Name of payee to create/use (optional; use payee_id if provided)

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: UUID of the category to associate (optional)

inputSchema.description: Path and body parameters for creating a scheduled transaction in YNAB.

tools.name: YNAB_DELETE_SCHEDULED_TRANSACTION
tools.description: Tool to delete an existing scheduled transaction. Use after confirming the scheduled transaction ID.

inputSchema.title: DeleteScheduledTransactionRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: The budget identifier. Use 'default' to target the default budget when enabled.

scheduled_transaction_id.title: Scheduled Transaction Id
scheduled_transaction_id.description: The identifier of the scheduled transaction to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for deleting a scheduled transaction.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_ACCOUNT_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single account resource. Use when you need details of a specific account by its ID after determining the budget.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled for your OAuth app.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: Account identifier (UUID) within the specified budget.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_BUDGET_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single budget by ID. Use when you need detailed budget info including date and currency formats. Supports optional delta via last_knowledge_of_server.

inputSchema.title: GetBudgetByIdRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: The ID of the budget to retrieve. Use 'default' if default budget selection is enabled.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional. If provided, returns only entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta request).

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a single budget by its identifier.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_BUDGET_MONTH
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific budget month. Use when you need detailed summary and category budgets for a given month after confirming the budget ID.

inputSchema.title: GetBudgetMonthRequest

month.title: Month
month.description: Budget month in ISO 8601 full-date format (YYYY-MM-01), UTC.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; if OAuth 'default budget selection' is enabled, you may use 'default'.

inputSchema.description: Path parameters for retrieving a single YNAB budget month.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_BUDGET_SETTINGS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve budget-level settings. Use when you need to fetch currency and date formatting preferences for a specific budget.

inputSchema.title: GetBudgetSettingsRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: ID of the budget to fetch settings for. Supports special values like 'last-used' or 'default'.

inputSchema.description: Request model for GET_BUDGET_SETTINGS.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_CATEGORY_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single budget category by its ID. Use when you need detailed information about one category after confirming the budget selection.

inputSchema.title: GetCategoryByIdRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier. If OAuth default budget selection is enabled,              you may use 'default' in place of a specific ID.

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: The unique identifier of the category to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a single category by its ID.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_MONTH_CATEGORY_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single category for a specific budget month. Use after selecting the budget and month when you need month-specific category details.

month.title: Month
month.description: Budget month in ISO 8601 full-date format (YYYY-MM-DD).

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if default budget selection is enabled.

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: Category identifier (UUID) within the specified budget month.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_PAYEE_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single payee by its ID. Use when you need full details of a payee after confirming the budget and payee selection.

inputSchema.title: GetPayeeByIdRequest

payee_id.title: Payee Id
payee_id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the payee to retrieve.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier. Use 'default' if OAuth default budget selection is enabled.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a single payee by its ID.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_SCHEDULED_TRANSACTION_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single scheduled transaction. Use when you need details of a specific scheduled transaction by its ID after confirming the budget.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

scheduled_transaction_id.title: Scheduled Transaction Id
scheduled_transaction_id.description: Scheduled transaction identifier (UUID) within the specified budget.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_TRANSACTION_BY_ID
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single transaction by its ID. Use when you need detailed information for a specific transaction after confirming the budget.

inputSchema.title: GetTransactionByIdRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: The budget ID. Use 'default' to reference the default budget when OAuth default budget selection is enabled.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a single transaction by its ID.

tools.name: YNAB_GET_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the authorized user's information. Use after authentication to get current user details.

inputSchema.title: GetUserRequest
inputSchema.description: Empty request model for GetUser action.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_ACCOUNTS
tools.description: Tool to list all accounts in a budget. Use when you need to retrieve all accounts (optionally only changes since last sync) after confirming the budget ID.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled for your OAuth app.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional. If provided, returns only entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta request).

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_BUDGETS
tools.description: Tool to list budgets available to the authorized user. Use when you need to retrieve all budgets for the account.

inputSchema.title: ListBudgetsRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for listing budgets. No parameters needed; uses Authorization header.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_CATEGORIES
tools.description: Tool to list all category groups and their categories for a budget. Use when you need the full set of budget categories or only those changed since last sync.

inputSchema.title: ListCategoriesRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled for your OAuth app.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: For delta syncing: only return categories changed since this server knowledge. Response will include an updated server_knowledge.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing category groups and categories for a budget.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_MONTHS
tools.description: Tool to list months for a budget with summary information. Use when you need an overview of all months or only changed months since a given knowledge value (delta requests).

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled for your OAuth app.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Monotonically increasing knowledge value for delta requests; if set, only returns months changed since this value.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_PAYEE_LOCATIONS
tools.description: Tool to list payee locations for a budget. Use when you need to retrieve all stored latitude/longitude details for payees under a specific budget.

inputSchema.title: ListPayeeLocationsRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing payee locations. No additional parameters besides budget_id.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_PAYEE_LOCATIONS_BY_PAYEE
tools.description: Tool to list locations associated with a payee. Use when you need all location entries of a given payee after confirming the budget.

inputSchema.title: ListPayeeLocationsByPayeeRequest

payee_id.title: Payee Id
payee_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) of the payee to list locations for.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if default budget selection is enabled.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing locations of a specific payee.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_PAYEES
tools.description: Tool to list payees in a budget. Use when you need all payees or only those changed since a known server knowledge value.

inputSchema.title: ListPayeesRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier. Use 'default' if OAuth default budget selection is enabled.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Only return entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta requests).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing payees in a budget.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_SCHEDULED_TRANSACTIONS
tools.description: Tool to list scheduled transactions for a budget. Use after confirming the budget ID; supports delta sync via last_knowledge_of_server.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional delta token. When provided, only scheduled transactions changed since this server knowledge value are returned.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_TRANSACTIONS
tools.description: Tool to list transactions in a budget. Use when you need all or delta-filtered transactions after confirming the budget.

inputSchema.title: ListTransactionsRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Filter by transaction type; supported values: 'uncategorized', 'unapproved'.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

since_date.title: Since Date
since_date.description: Only include transactions on or after this ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD).

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional. If provided, returns only entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta request).

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing transactions in a budget, with optional filters.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_TRANSACTIONS_BY_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Tool to list transactions for a specific account. Use when you need all or delta-filtered transactions for a given account after confirming the budget and account ID.

inputSchema.title: ListTransactionsByAccountRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Filter by transaction type; supported values: 'uncategorized', 'unapproved'.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: Account identifier; the ID of the account to retrieve transactions from.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional. If provided, returns only entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta request).

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing transactions for a specific account in a budget.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_TRANSACTIONS_BY_CATEGORY
tools.description: Tool to list transactions for a specific category (excludes pending). Use when you need completed transactions for a given category after obtaining budget_id and category_id.

inputSchema.title: ListTransactionsByCategoryRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Filter by transaction type; supported values: 'uncategorized', 'unapproved'.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' if the default budget selection is enabled.

since_date.title: Since Date
since_date.description: Only include transactions on or after this ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD).

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: Category identifier whose transactions are to be retrieved.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Delta-style filter; only return entities changed since this server knowledge index.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing transactions for a specific category.

tools.name: YNAB_LIST_TRANSACTIONS_BY_PAYEE
tools.description: Tool to list transactions for a specific payee in a budget. Use when you need to fetch all non-pending transactions for a payee after confirming budget and payee IDs.

inputSchema.title: ListTransactionsByPayeeRequest

type.title: Type
type.description: Optional filter by transaction type: 'uncategorized' or 'unapproved'.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier; use 'default' for the default budget if enabled for your OAuth app.

since_date.title: Since Date
since_date.description: Optional ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD). Only include transactions on or after this date.

last_knowledge_of_server.title: Last Knowledge Of Server
last_knowledge_of_server.description: Optional. If provided, returns only entities changed since this server knowledge value (delta request).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing transactions by payee in a budget.

tools.name: YNAB_UPDATE_PAYEE
tools.description: Tool to update a payee. Use when you need to rename an existing payee.

inputSchema.title: UpdatePayeeRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The new name for the payee.

payee_id.title: Payee Id
payee_id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the payee to update.

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget identifier. Use 'default' if OAuth default budget selection is enabled.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing payee.

tools.name: YNAB_UPDATE_SCHEDULED_TRANSACTION
tools.description: Tool to update an existing scheduled transaction. Use when you need to change details of a scheduled transaction after confirming IDs.

inputSchema.title: UpdateScheduledTransactionRequest

budget_id.title: Budget Id
budget_id.description: Budget UUID or literal 'last-used'/'default' to operate on

scheduled_transaction.title: Scheduled Transaction

memo.title: Memo
memo.description: Optional note for the scheduled transaction

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount in milliunits (1,000 = 1 unit of currency)

payee_id.title: Payee Id
payee_id.description: UUID of an existing payee (optional; use payee_name if not provided)

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: Repeat frequency using YNAB standard schedule values

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: UUID of the account where the scheduled transaction will post

date_first.title: Date First
date_first.description: First scheduled date in YYYY-MM-DD format

payee_name.title: Payee Name
payee_name.description: Name of payee to create/use (optional; use payee_id if provided)

category_id.title: Category Id
category_id.description: UUID of the category to associate (optional)

scheduled_transaction.description: Fields of the scheduled transaction to update

scheduled_transaction_id.title: Scheduled Transaction Id
scheduled_transaction_id.description: Identifier of the scheduled transaction to update

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for updating a scheduled transaction.
